Please enter brief description of status.
Finish time is unable to be faster than start time.
Start time is unable to be later than finish time.
0월 0일(요일) 00시 00분 철야퇴근을 등록하시겠습니까?: Are you going to register work finish time after all-night work on {{arg3}}, {{arg1}}-{{arg2}} at {{arg4}}:{{arg5}}
You can delete when you select registered status.
상태에 대한 간단 설명을 입력하세요: Please provide a brief description of the status.
The rest time name is a required entry.
After setting the date, press the OK button.
신청사유제한: You can enter up to 255 characters.
늦은 퇴근 체크:
Is it late work?
Start work?
늦은 퇴근 설명:
If you are going to work after the day before, Press [Finish],
If you want to check for a new job today, please Press the [Start] button.
The end of the break time can not be earlier than the start time. Please check break time.
철야 설명: Bonded to the start date of the work
근태그룹설명1: * In case of extended / night work, approval may be used for working hours recognition. For more information, please read the guide.
근태그룹설명2: * Rest time is not included in total working hours.
근태그룹설명3: * It is the time specified by administrator setting, and the total working time may be different depending on the setting.
기본 근무시간 초과(0): Over the limit of basic work time({{arg1}})
연장 근무시간 초과(0): Over the limit of over work time({{arg1}})
선택적근로제 근무가능시간 설명: flexible working system  {{arg1}} ~ {{arg2}} (Total over work time on {{arg3}} or less)
Manage total overtime to {{arg1}} or less
선택근무 툴팁: My cumulative working hours - Basic work time basis
초과근무 툴팁: My cumulative over working hours - Basic work time basis
승인근무 툴팁: Approved working hours through approval - Over work time basis
40시간 초과 알림 설명: Notifications are sent automatically before or over the week for 40 hours.
52시간 초과 알림 설명: Notifications are sent automatically before or over the week for 52 hours.
앞으로 매일 평균: Avg time which have to work in a day
결재 근무시간 도움말: * If you start work after midnight, please specify the next day.
주간 누적 근무시간: Cumulative working hours of the week
총 최소근무시간 안내: {{arg1}} The total minimum working time for the month is {{arg2}}.
총 최대근무시간 안내: {{arg1}} The total maximum working time for the month is {{arg2}}.
동기화 클릭: If you want to check previous statistic, please click the Sync button.
동기화 설명: Sync is the function that convert the previous work statistics to new work statistics. Handle massive amounts of data easily.
출근 미체크 설명: If the Start work(Task) has not been checked. Except day off.
퇴근 미체크 설명: If the end work(Task End) has not been checked. Except day off.
결근 설명: In case the start or end not check without day off, other status registration, statistics only derive absences. It is treated as if the user did not check start/end.
지각 설명: In case the start check was processed after the set start or core time.
이른 퇴근 설명: In case the end check was processed before the set end work time or core time.
휴가 설명: Using day off kind off 1 day off, 0.5 half day off etc.
접속 미인증 설명: In case of check same device or unconfirmed device.
자동퇴근 설명: In case of auto-end work because the end work has not been checked.
연장근무 설명: In case of excess of the default working hours
야간근무 설명: In case of work during the set night shift.
휴일근무 설명: In case of work on non specified working day
기타상태 설명: In case of add working type by the manager
오늘까지최소근무시간안내: The minimum working hours this month should be accumulated by today is {{arg1}}.
부서 근태 현황통계 설명: You can set whether to disclose attendence status/statistics of staff(including sub-department) to manager(co-manager).
근무 그룹 설명 타이틀: Support various of working type by setting group.
근무 그룹 설명 서브 타이틀: DaouOffice attendence management includes key functions such as commuting time, working hours calculation method, basic policy, and workplace assignment based on work group setting. Please check the information below for management purposes.
근무 그룹 설정 설명 타이틀: Default working group are created when using attendence management, and all members belong to them.
근무 그룹 설정 설명 타이틀B: .Even if a particular member belongs to a group, it is treated with the most sorted workgroup settings in the group.
근무 그룹 설정 설명A: Manage by group members of the same type, such as working days, working hours, etc.
근무 그룹 설정 설명B: Exception for members who do not need commuting management
근무일정 타이틀: Daou Office can set a work schedule as shown below.
근무일정 설명A: Every working day using set commuting, end working time, or using freely.
근무일정 설명B: Employee can decied freely to start working time and leave office after fixed working(working hours).
근무일정 설명C: Set only the total working hours (working days * working hours) within one month, and the workers are free to start and end work hours for each day.
근무시간 산정 타이틀A: Even if the working hours are exceeded, the total working hours can be calculated based on the fixed working hours (working hours).
근무시간 산정 타이틀B: The total working hours can be calculated based on commuting checks.
근무시간 설명A: Total hours of work can be designated, ignoring early work, late work hours
근무시간 설명B: Providing an approval process through approval for overtime work
추가 관리기능 설명A: History of group : When the manager group is modified, check the history in attendence status of each member.
추가 관리기능 설명B: Alarm : Send alarm of overtime warnings according to work schedule
추가 관리기능 설명C: Attendence IP storage: Auto-static IP registration to prevent the use of the same device
추가 관리기능 설명D: Attendence statistics : Certain groups are excluded from the management of enterprise work statistics.
휴게시간 툴팁:
On a total of 9 hours of work, the set break time is auto-excluded from the total working hours.
(Example: 09:00 to 18:00 commuting check, 8 hours total for 1 hour rest)
표준근무시간 툴팁:
When using the flexible working hours system, the commuting time is free, so the standard working hours standard applied to the daily working hours is required.
(Ex : Working hours from 06:00 to 22:00, if set to 8 hours, the total working hours will be treated as 8 hours per day.)
근태자 IP 자동 저장 설명:
IP is auto-saved in employee account information when working status is checked when using IP auto storage.
If the IP is saved and checked to an address different from that IP, the enterprise attendence statistics indicate that IP is not authenticated.
http에서의 gps실패 메시지: Location information cannot be obtained from untrusted sites(https).
근태정보 노출 기능 사용: Use of attendance information exposure function
근태정보 노출 설정 툴팁: You can check attendance information such as annual leave and commuting time in PC messenger/mobile app/Web user profile, organization chart, and conversation list.
신청내역 체크 메세지: Your application is blank. Please click the Add button.
위치정보 미동의 경고: User consent to the collection of location information is required. Daou Office Mobile App > Settings > Allow location information collection.
퇴근 클릭 주의사항: You can click on the clock from 1 minute after the click on the clock.
